Silicom Network – Shared Webhosting for $12/year and Reseller Hosting from $3.99/month

dallas, germany, reseller hosting, shared hosting, silicomnetwork.com, texas, web hosting May 27, 2020 @ 6:03 am, by Jon Biloh

Silicom Network has submitted their first offer to Low End Box for both shared web hosting and two reseller hosting packages. These exclusive offers are discounted by a very impressive 80% compared to their normal retail pricing. The services are hosted in either Dallas Texas or Germany. If you signup please be sure to leave your comments below for others.

Their ToS/Legal Docs are published on their website for review. They accept PayPal.

Here’s what they had to say: 

“Since our founding in 1998, Silicom Network has continually innovated new ways to deliver on our mission: to empower people to fully harness the web. We provide comprehensive tools to hundreds of users throughout the world so anyone, novice or pro, can get on the web and thrive with our web hosting packages.

We provide you with exceptional support. Our dedicated Systems Administrators and Front End Technical Support can answer your questions and provide you with a superior level of support. If you require your website to be up and running at lightning speed all of the time then you can trust Silicom Network as your hosting provider. We offer you redundancy within our high end servers, and redundancy with our superior connectivity. This means that your website will be up and running at full speed all of the time (99.8%).

Some of the benefits of hosting your business website with Silicom Network: Free SSL for all domains and subdomains,  Softaculous.& 24/7 support. Cpanel accounts includes: Free website builder and Inmunify360 (Automated Malware Scanner with Cleanup).”

Here are the offers: 

Linux Shared Web Hosting

  • 1 Domain
  • Unlimited SSD Disk Space
  • Unlimited Bandwidth
  • Unlimited Email Accounts
  • Unlimited MySQL
  • PHP 5.x & 7.x
  • Unlimited FTP Accounts
  • Unlimited Subdomains
  • Unlimited Domain Alias
  • POP3/IMAP/SMTP Support
  • cPanel Web Hosting
  • Free Unlimited SSL
  • Free R1SOFT Website Backups
  • Price: $12/year
  • [ORDER HERE]

  • 25 Domains

  • Unlimited Bandwidth
  • Unlimited Email Accounts
  • Unlimited MySQL
  • PHP 5.x & 7.x
  • Unlimited FTP Accounts
  • Unlimited Subdomains
  • Unlimited Domain Alias
  • POP3/IMAP/SMTP Support
  • Directadmin Web Hosting
  • Free Unlimited SSL
  • Free remote backup
  • Softaculous (250+ scripts)
  • Price: $3.99/month
  • [ORDER HERE]

Reseller 2 – DirectAdmin

  • 60 Domains
  • 75 gb SSD Disk Space
  • Unlimited Bandwidth
  • Unlimited Email Accounts
  • Unlimited MySQL
  • PHP 5.x & 7.x
  • Unlimited FTP Accounts
  • Unlimited Subdomains
